outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>Mario's up smash is active frames 9 to 12 (Head Intangible: 9 to 12). Mario can act on frame 40. You can ask about another one of Mario's moves, or name another character and move.</speak>
<speak>Mario's up smash is active frames 9 to 12 (Head Intangible: 9 to 12). Mario can act on frame 40. You can ask about another one of Mario's moves, or name another character and move.</speak>
